history.content: I'm stopping in Amsterdam briefly for work and need a straightforward hotel that's quiet, dependable, and close enough to get around easily.

Based on your preferences, I would recommend staying at The Modern Hideaway. It offers a comfortable room service, terrace, garden, free biliards, and a rooftop terrace, which should provide a relaxing environment. Additionally, it is centrally located and easy to navigate, making it convenient for getting around.
Do you think The Modern Hideaway also offers breakfast included? That would be great since I don't want to miss out on any food while I'm here.
Yes, The Modern Hideaway does offer breakfast included. This makes it even more suitable for your needs. Enjoy your stay!
Do they have parking available near the hotel? That would save me from finding somewhere else to park my car during my visit.
The Modern Hideaway does offer parking, so you won't have to worry about finding somewhere to park your car during your visit. This will make your stay much more convenient.
Do they have Wi-Fi available throughout the hotel? I'd appreciate if there was good internet access for working remotely.
Yes, The Modern Hideaway provides free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, ensuring you'll have reliable internet access for working remotely. This will make your stay more comfortable and productive.
Do they have an early check-in option? I might arrive late in the evening, and having an early check-in could help me start my day without rushing.
Unfortunately, The Modern Hideaway does not offer an early check-in option. However, you can inquire about alternative arrangements upon arrival. They may be able to accommodate your request.
Can you confirm if The Modern Hideaway has a shuttle service to the airport? I'd appreciate knowing if I can avoid driving myself when I leave the next morning.

The Modern Hideaway does not offer a shuttle service to the airport. While this means you'll still need to drive yourself, it ensures that you're not responsible for transportation to the airport. You can plan accordingly.
Can you tell me more about their breakfast menu? I'm looking for something light but filling.

The Modern Hideaway's breakfast menu includes items like fruit, yogurt, and cereal, along with fresh juices and coffee. There are also some continental options available. While the variety isn't extensive, it should satisfy your needs for a quick and simple meal.
Thank you very much for all the information! I've found everything I needed.
